Projects on Github

Projects

Projects worked on with source code on github

SCPT

Clinical Placement Tool Connecting Students with Hospital's Placement Schedule. It provides a single platform for various end-users to collaborate and communicate, making clinical scheduling easier for students and hospitals.

OLT

Our site contains the best learning content and tools to help you succeed. We have used the python & django framework to build this tool, it currently uses nltk librarires and others to analyze any uploaded document, it then breaks down the document into useful results.

CT Seniors

We are in the process of making Connecticut a more hospitable place for all seniors living in the state. We would like to provide an easy-to-use web interface for Seniors to search, find results, get directions and much more.

About Sajiv

A result-driven business/IT professional with in depth experience in applying SDLC methodologies in software development. Applied GAAP and IFRS guidelines while configuring ERP systems to ensure optimal integration and efficient information availability. Expertise in applying project planning, design including vision, blue print, configuration, data migration, unit testing, integration testing, end user training. Efficient in analyzing business requirements, needs, objectives and mapping them to functional specifications needed for system design and implementation.

Sajiv Francis

Software Engineer/Architect
